title: And Then There Were Four
description: Epilogue to FairyvilleThis epilogue came about because, when my fabulous editor finished telling me how fun and sexy she thought FAIRYVILLE was, she added: “I was seriously tempted to ask you for that foursome you hinted was coming at the end, but the characters do need some rest ?.” Needless to say, most authors respond well to praise, and I decided my fictional peeps could rally their strength after all. I hope you enjoy watching Zoe, Magnus, Bryan, and Alex find their personal slice of heaven in a snowy cabin in the Rocky Mountains …
author: Emma Holly
